title: J.C - Workshop: Introduction in Cinematics storytelling
description:
Record of the workshop on cinematics storytelling given by Marijn from Soulmade. Very interesting, with lots of good tips.
It end with a workshop in 360 where the team play a short scene with the tips given by Marijn.

It took place at the WTC Brussels in the office of F/lat.

0:00 : Start of the conference
35:49 : Marijn Movie example
53:41 : Deal with spacial sound
1:28:32 : Start of the Workshop
2:21:36 : Set of the scene
2:29:24 : First scene try
2:43:15 : Final story in 360



Soulmade : http://soulmade.media/
VR-Lab  Meet Up : http://goo.gl/qCuNb8
F/lat : http://f-lat.org/
360 Final Demo: https://youtu.be/irWMhlxnETs

Thanks for Watching.
May the code be with you.
author: Jams Center
